website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins P5 are an excellent set of headphones; however, the detachable cable is a problem.
With the P5, Bowers & Wilkins gracefully enters the consumer headphone market with a stunning design that's comfortable and sonically superb.
pros: Equipped with iPhone/iPod in-line remote control
cons: Despite the claim, offers no noise isolation

customer_reviews.title: Incomparable
customer_reviews.text: Just...really these things are just honestly astounding. In fact, they're cheaper than Beats and Bose, two brands known for their "logo upcharge", and can blow each of them out of the studio. They're also frightfully better looking, classic, like something out of an early Desmond Llewelyn laboratory. The build quality is something to be honored with a national holiday. No plastic! I honestly do not know why people spend so much money on those other brands, when the B&W P5 can be had for less. Now that you know about these, even if you don't purchase them, you can silently laugh at every person you see walking by with Beats headphones. What idiots.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair of over ear headphones but didn't know much about them so I foolishly bought the Dre Beats. Hated them... way to uncomfortable on my already small head. After seeing rave reviews on the B&W's I jumped on the $99 recertified Ivory PS5's. Wow...Amazing sound, comfort & style! I love these headphones! Awesome noise canceling. I've worn these during an extremely loud tap class before and I was in my own musical world :)
customer_reviews.author: Clandry22

customer_reviews.title: not perfect in condition, but sounds good, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is recertified P5(not 2nd model, but 1st. which I personally prefer the sound) The headphone itself and a cable without remote comes in paper box. metal part and headphone's unit is somewhat damaged. metal parts are scratched, and leather covering surface of the unit is partially damaged. but all the replacement parts - such as earpads, headband cover, and cable - seems to be brand new. very clean in condition. also there no problem in sound. each unit works well. no L/R volume balancing problems. sounds just as good as ordinary P5 headphones. I think $140 discount for no pouch, no mic cable, and some scratches makes quite a fair deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful headphones
customer_reviews.text: Made with beautiful fine leather and metal, these headphones really ooze quality. Even the quilted carrying pouch is impressive. Sound quality to match, though I am not an audiophile snob. The only thing is that as a refurb item, there was a bit of a smudge on the leather from the prior owner. The leather is hard to clean, so don't try unless you really know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Arisaka38

customer_reviews.title: comfort, build quality, and sound, b&w hits the trivecta
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this purchase. build quality and comfort are exemplary. sound quality is all i would hope for from a high end headphone,accurate and balanced with no unnatural emphasis on any particular frequency response. i suspect the phones are a good deal better than my source material (mostly npr music channel). hopefully i can pick up an audio quest dragonfly in the near future and give these b&w s a better test. i purchased these open box and im extremely pleased. oh, did i mention they are very comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: jrfw

customer_reviews.title: the color comes off with sweat
customer_reviews.text: It gets two stars for decent sound quality and initial impression but loses all the other stars due to the fact that after a couple of months the white coloring of the item started coming off from sweat and eventually left the item looking absolutely horrible. I expected more durability from such a reputable brand. Luckily they swopped out the unit for a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stevens

customer_reviews.title: ... these are that they are white and attract dirt like a magnet
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback to these are that they are white and attract dirt like a magnet. Probably why B&W discontinued the color. For what I paid they are absolutely fantastic; they are definitely a step above the P3's!
customer_reviews.author: kamikaze31

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is great, sound quality isn't good in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is great, sound quality isn't good in my opinion: They seem to struggle and break up and moderate volumes, and the definition just isn't there. I tried listening to classical, rock, metal, pop... And I couldn't pick out anything that I thought this set did very well, except look good, which I expect they'll do for quite some time, because they're built so well.
customer_reviews.author: ThreepE0

customer_reviews.title: ... I got these knowing that they didn't sound the best, but I was ok with that because I ...
customer_reviews.text: So I got these knowing that they didn't sound the best, but I was ok with that because I was willing to trade off sound for comfort and looks, but boy, I was wrong. These hurt my ears after an hour of use on my medium sized head. So now I'm down a hundred bucks for some mediocre sounding headphones that are uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pete.T

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in 2011. Little late on writing the review. Shortest lifespan of any headphone I’ve ever owned. Company basically would fix for price of new headset.
customer_reviews.author: BuysLotsOfStuff

customer_reviews.title: Audiophile Approved
customer_reviews.text: I own the B&W Nautilus 800 series speakers and these headphones have very similar audio signature as its big brother. The sound is neutral without exaggeration in either bass or treble. The material is top quality using leather and metal. No plastic. I had problems with the in line remote where the volume up detent was permanently pushed in. I called B&W and they instructed me to go to their website to claim a warranty and they replaced the cord for free. Recommended for those who demands pure unaltered sound.
customer_reviews.author: B1R

customer_reviews.title: Communicating with customer service is useless. No one can answer what the warranty is ...
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound great- they get used maybe 2x per week. After one year, the cord is shorting out. Communicating with customer service is useless. No one can answer what the warranty is for the cord- I keep being sent to the parts store. The end that is plugged into my computer has to be wiggled or I get no sound. I would expect better quality for the price. Frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Erica Adams

customer_reviews.title: The ear phones worked fine. I understand they are refurb but this were ...
customer_reviews.text: The ear phones worked fine. I understand they are refurb but this were pretty scuffed up, the cable to the phone was not standard, no volume control. I had to order the correct one from B&W
customer_reviews.author: obj

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound and clarity
customer_reviews.text: My 27-yr old son received these for Christmas and he loves them! He is quite an officianado when it comes to things electronic and music. He was very impressed with the sound quality and outside noice reduction. He also loved the comfort and how classy they look. Having the phone control is a very important feature for him, too. I felt very proud being able to surprise him with such a nice present - one that he wouldn't spend that kind of money on but really appreciates that kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but a little snug
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very balanced. The bass is tight, and the mids and highs are clean. I am not an audiophile but I really like these headphones. The only complaint it that they are a little tight, this is a pro and a con, I appreciate the fit when I am on a plane becuase it blocks the surrounding noise, but for extended use on my computer my ears will start to fatigue after 2 hours, I'll take them off for an hour and repeat. For the sound quality and premium look and feel they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SR-Halo

customer_reviews.title: Wonky cord-what's with that?
customer_reviews.text: Headpones are great but the lightweight cord from them is short and within one day of use started acting wonky [have to wiggle cord right at the tip that plugs into the unit to make it work properly] If they put a decent cord with a reasonable length [less than 4'ft] my rating would be a 5. Such a good headset with such a bad cord.......and for $200+, the cord should be a good quality one.
customer_reviews.author: MJ McQuillin

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and they look nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife as a Mother's Day gift and she loves them! They are very comfortable and they look nice. She doesn't like that there is some noise which leaks in around the headphones, but the levels are acceptable given the quality of the sound produced by them. They certainly seem more durable, since there are no plastic components, but she wishes that the controller and microphone worked for Android as well as Apple cell phones/products as well. Would definitely recommend their purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Works best on acoustic music and less heavily-bass music.
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed how great this headphones work on acoustic/jazz/big band types of music. On the other hands, i found the bass wasn't that impressive especially when I listen to rock/r&b music. And the overall sounding is not warm enough. However it's only my first day of use, guess I will update how's the quality improve later. Overall, i really love its clarity, a must have for acoustic lovers.
customer_reviews.author: mistyrain

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound And Leather Smell
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and very light weight. Highly adjustable to your noggin. For on ear phones they issolate very well. The sound is comparable to the Sennheiser Momentums if that helps you out. The down is the cord is very thin and is always getting caught on stuff. These work great for listening while laying down on pillow, where others will just be pushed off your head.
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are certainly good Headphones. Based on other reviews, I'll have to see if they last. As expensive as they were, I hope they do. They produce great sound, though their pretty heavy. Overall I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a real high fidelity guy, but wanted nice headphones and love the uniqueness of these...and the build quality. Sound is excellent across the range. Bass nuts might need something more focused on bass. These have the nice balance I'm listening for in my music. Ear cushions are nice, comfortable....and I think replaceable. Smart design, no plastic.
customer_reviews.author: gsgoinwest

customer_reviews.title: Good but not good enough to warrant the price
customer_reviews.text: P5's sound nice. I also own a pair of P7's (AMAZING), but didn't want to use them for everyday use and chores. I decided to buy a refurbished set of P5's ($80) for those types of activities. At eighty bucks they're awesome but if I paid $235 for them I would be very, very disappointed. I thought they would be close to the P7's but they're not even close. My recommendation, spend an extra $100 for the P7's. At $80 the P5's are a solid 4 - 4.5 stars, at $235 they are at best a 3 star set.
customer_reviews.author: John and Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. The P5's sound clear and accurate to my ears. I've always enjoyed the sound of B&W speakers and these earphones are true to form. A real steal for these recertified models. I could find no indication that these were not brand new other than the outer box. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for a very, very good closed back earphone.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, excellent headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones fold flat for storage or to fit in a carry-on. Excellent sound quality. Wish they were a little more comfortable to wear for long periods, but that's a function of their fit so close to the ear. The temples of my glasses eventually makes my ears hurt where the earphones press against them. Otherwise, these headphones are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, could have been better..!
customer_reviews.text: Look and leather feel are great, sound quality is top notch. Only issue is with the design, might not work for everyone. Discomfort with the position of the headphones creeps in when used longer.
customer_reviews.author: AK9999

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT SOUND IN A SUBTLE PACKAGE
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, low key head phones for those who don't want the showy Beats headset on their head. My husband appreciates the subtlety but, most importantly, the sound quality of these headphones is the best that he's tried.
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: The P5s look and feel even better than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The P5s look and feel even better than the pictures. I am not an audiophile but these sound absolutely fantastic. They do sit a bit too tight on my big head, but I have that problem with most headphones until they adjust after some use. I would get the Bose QuietComfort 15s if you are looking for active noice cancelling, but if you are happy with noise reducing headphones and want a pair that look classy, then these are probably the top choice.
customer_reviews.author: P.D.

customer_reviews.title: nice headphones at a bargain price - comparable or better ...
customer_reviews.text: nice headphones at a bargain price - comparable or better to any set of speakers or headphones out there - best buy has them out there for demo but get them through Amazon/Sonic Copters if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are incredible. I was a little hesitant since the B&W in-ear earphones were, I thought, overrated. I have to say that these put the Bose to shame....and they are not powered! The fit is super comfortable and the sound is unbelievable. I can hardly say enough. I'd give these 6 stars if it were possible.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Great for listening to my turntable without driving the girlfriend crazy
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these since April, and I use them all the time! I love them! The sound is great! They're not noise canceling, but you'd almost think they are! The mic is also really good!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: it was a really bad thing for me
customer_reviews.text: It came without the main cable... the one with the mic... it was a really bad thing for me... it works fine though...
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Constantin

customer_reviews.title: I looove my P5 headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed these headphones! They are very high class. They are not noise-cancelling, but they do a fantastic job blocking out background noise. I have had these for about a year and a half and the headphones have held up fantastically. The sound that these headphones produce is great as well. I had a Grado 325is pair, but I had to trade those in for these cans. Stay way from the Dre's... They aren't your style. Class it up with some P5's. I know you'll enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: thganey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchases. Very comfortable and the natural sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchases. Very comfortable and the natural sound is phenomenal. Though decertified, you can not differentiate from new. Quality headphones really change your musical listening experience. You'll hear notes you've never heard before. I like these headphones, but I did not write the review listed above. I an still trying to figure out how it was written and associated with my name.
customer_reviews.author: A.J. de Keyzer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good. However
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good. However, the product looked like the used one, when I opened the box. Both of the ear cover and the outside cover had a bit of stains. I am not sure, whether I can expect almost the new one from the re-certified product.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Geun Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Sound Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my GF. She's a professional opera singer, and she loves them. I specifically sought out the Series 1 instead of the Series 2 because many audiophile reviews have commented that the Series 2 are inferior to the Series 1.
customer_reviews.author: ASP

customer_reviews.title: Best sounding Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I tried several pair of headphones and these were simply the best. Great sound and very soft on the ears. The first time I listened the range from high to lows blew me away. If I ever need another pair this is what I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: RickL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Purchase Experience... It's really a Concert for One
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones after carefully reading the reviews from different sources T3 iPad edition, Engadget, Cnet and other audiophiles on the Internet and the P5 has been highly reviewed since it's debut. I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. On looks, it's fantastic eye candy On comfort, there's nothing like it, it's soft and comfortable. On Noise Isolation, the background sound is nearly non existence and doesn't create a vacuum around your ears. And lastly and mostly the sound is simply fantastic. It's a purchase experience you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Toyedayo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great performance, great comfort, great style. I like watching my friends try them and see how they react
customer_reviews.author: LB in Dallas

customer_reviews.title: tight fit squeezes your head
customer_reviews.text: tight fit squeezes your head too much even though the sound is very good. not worth the price if you cant wear them for too long. NOTE: I dont have a large head at all. on the smaller size
customer_reviews.author: B. paulson

customer_reviews.title: I like my over ear set of Bowers much more
customer_reviews.text: Hard on ears if wear for more than 2 hours. Sound is ok. I like my over ear set of Bowers much more.
customer_reviews.author: byron clay

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great comfort
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound, very musical. Also soft and comfortable, easy to watch a long movie on my tablet without headphones becoming uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Middle Age Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beats Beats by a mile!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned. Very high quality sound and comfortable on the ears. Put's Dre's Beats to shame for sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love this headphone
customer_reviews.text: I love this headphone, I have been using it everyday, it comfortables, the sound excellent good, very well build. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: spider1135

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones. Super comfortable. Decent noise blockage from non NC headphones. The replaceable cable is a bit flimsy though.
customer_reviews.author: Yann

customer_reviews.title: Very Good! I Like It
customer_reviews.text: The B&W P5 Has very good natural sound reproduction. I like the fit better than my Sennheiser HD25. Sound balance is very good, not like my Bose OE where the low freq are more dominant.
customer_reviews.author: iZsha

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good sound quality for the money. Good shipping speed.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Good sound quality for the money. Good shipping speed.
customer_reviews.author: CPT KILO

customer_reviews.title: B&W stands tall.
customer_reviews.text: These P5's are incredible. Yes, they aren't the cheapest kids on the block, but you'll enjoy them for 20 years, so that makes them worthy of the dollars you spent. REAL LEATHER! What a treat that is on your ears. Beautiful to look at, and more beautiful to hear.
customer_reviews.author: RAE

customer_reviews.title: They stopped working after three weeks and I was unable ...
customer_reviews.text: They stopped working after three weeks and I was unable to revive support. Edit: the cable wasn't working and the problem was fixed by a new cable. Get the cordless.
customer_reviews.author: erin day

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: These cans are good, not great. Stylish and solid, but a bit tight on the head and they get warm quickly. Sound quality is nice, but not special. Would be a good deal at $200.
customer_reviews.author: moshimoshi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous headphones. Period. I can't get them away from my husband, who borrows them constantly. Bass is not as enormous as other cans (Beats by Dr. Dre for example), but I find these to be much more balanced. Heard things in music I'd never heard before. They're comfy, but I would not recommend these for working out. They're not noise-canceling, but the pads block out quite a bit of ambient noise. I use them at work to drown out the sounds of other cubicle noise and they're amazing! The fact that they double as a mic for your phone is a huge plus as well. I would definitely buy these again. Oh, they're also pretty snazzy looking. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: ReluctantConsumer

customer_reviews.title: These squeeze the life out of your head. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These squeeze the life out of your head. I don't event have a big head! They hurt after about an hour of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after reading good reviews online and I was interested on the great mix of looks and sound quality. The sound is great and while active noise isolation is missing, isolation from outside noise is still great and definitely helps in noisy environments like airplanes. Also it looks gorgeous and I have to admit you get a good feeling by just wearing them :) Overall the best headphones I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Simone Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the refurbished one but quality is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: p5's all the way
customer_reviews.text: really wanted the P&, but these are doing just as well. they're a little tight at times, but the sound is clear and true love'em
customer_reviews.author: amazonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. He loves them! They look sleek and he reports the sound is incredible. Very happy with the purchase. They also arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JLove

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are by far the best on the market for sound and outside noise canceling. Had all the base and treble I wanted. I would rate these headphones, Quality with a capital Q. At least for now, there is nothing in the market that comes close.
customer_reviews.author: Pete B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft leather and the sound is amazing worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I knew nothing about Bowers & Wilkins prior to researching brands of headphones. I'm sold. Great sound in a stylish package at a reasonable price. The only drawback in my opinion is the thin chord.
customer_reviews.author: G. Garoffolo

customer_reviews.title: Stylist, Comfortable Portable Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Emphasis on the Portable. This does not compare to the Grados, this is not meant to. Extremely comfortable, and makes airplane flights much much more tolerable. *Some have noted that the headphones sounds a little muddled, but doth protests too much. Keep in mind that this is a closed portable system. Buy a dedicated headphone if you do most of your listening at home.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones so much for their clarity and comfort. As some other reviews state they can get warm after long wearing on the ears. Buying on Amazon saved me big money.
customer_reviews.author: james a bennett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot do better for $100. One of the most comfortable on ear headphones I have.
customer_reviews.author: Sad Gadget Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, clear, tight and beautiful. Now considering more b&w purchases. I'm really looking forward to my next trip on a plane. Pure bliss.
customer_reviews.author: R. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, high quality construction, lacks low range
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get my B&W P5s. The design is really nice and the headphones are very compact and make for easy travel. I've mostly used Bose Q15s in the past and was expecting similar sound quality for these ones particularly given their premium price point and also I assumed that more $$$ were going into the sound rather than the noise-cancelling features of the Bose. The mid and high ranges are good. The low range bass is definitely lacking compared to the Bose. To get a good bass sound, you have to press the earphones closer to your head. Maybe it's partially due to the ear pieces not being entirely over the ear?
customer_reviews.author: WonderWoman

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering these headphones due to their recertified label however was pleasantly surprised when I got them earlier than expected, boxed and brand new. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Best set of head phone that I have had. I traveled from TN to Korea with no issue concerning sound. Only reason that this doesn't get 5 stars is because of comfort. Though they are comfortable there were time I had to give my ears a rest.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: quick service, awesome response, my husband loved his Christmas gift, B & W blows beats out of the water A++++++++
customer_reviews.author: patryce

customer_reviews.title: great but...
customer_reviews.text: great for sound quality but has some problem complete sound blocking with memory form is good but when i hear it for hours ears is hurt and eaching. and headband seems not strong . It must be handleded with caution. cable is thin so It is good for mobile but also fragile for home
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for my wife and she loves them. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones. NOT comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones a week ago. i'm very impressed from their sound quality and build quality. the only thing that's annoying is that you can't listen to your beloved music for more than 20 minutes without letting your ears rest. at first it feels amazing on your head, but after a while the pressure on your head gets too hard. it's a shame. Design- 10\10 Sound- 10\10 Durability- 10\10 comfort- 6\10 i'm not going to return them.. the sound is way too good :) overall - good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Blumstein

customer_reviews.title: Broke way too soon!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones but the connector for the cord snapped off in the first month of use. That has never happened to my free apple headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Manfredi

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: awesome sound and pretty design. I love bowers & wilkins p5. It's very simple and easy on comfortable to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Ben james

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As someone who bought a pair of B&W matrix 1E loudspeakers back in the 70s for £650, ie. nearly $1000, and has loved them ever since, I knew that headphones from B&W were going to be good. But I never thought THIS GOOD! These are without doubt the best, the very best headphones out there. I agree with a reviewer who expressed disappointment with the case - It is a bit like a toiletries bag, but it does the job. My advice - buy a pair and die happy :)
customer_reviews.author: MrB

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones after looking through a massive amount of reviews. These are the perfect balance of quality sound and comfort. Plus, they look really clean and sleek. I primarily use them for gaming and music.
customer_reviews.author: midanitime

customer_reviews.title: B&W P5
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound with perfect finish and design! Very easy to adjust. This is the "Rolls Royce" amongst the top premium headphones currently available on the market but at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Dave P

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, AWFUL Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound has been great, much better than Beats and Bose. Great for music, movies, etc. But the quality is awful. The foam ear pads are sticky all over the inside and it started that way right after the warranty was over, which kinda sucks. Now it's very hard to take off the ear pads. These are supposed to be high quality product, but I think a $25 headphones won't have those problems. Don't buy them. The cord is awful too. You have to be very careful taking it out of input. I have gone thru 4 of them already. You can see in the video what happens to them. The tip comes off the input.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This headphone sounds *GREAT*, but not the greatest I've tried/auditioned. For example: Sennheiser HD650 and Shure SE535 actually sound better in my opinion. But these head/earphones cost more than P5 just to point out. Having said so, even if i could have afford them, I would still go for P5 just simply for one greatest feature, it's very comfortable to wear! Yes, I sometimes forget that I'm wearing a headphone. And by the way, it also looks great for bonus :) Lastly, this headphone is not cheap; but I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Meiwin

customer_reviews.title: Incredible quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested these headphones for his birthday. They are terrific, provide high-quality, stereo sound, and keep out unwanted outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hipps

customer_reviews.title: Great built, terrible sound.
customer_reviews.text: I got refurbished item. Sound was pretty bad on iPhone and Hi Res Player. I did sound a bit better on Macbook 12. But still would not give more than $10 for such sound. No bass, no hi freqs, mids are bad as well. Sounds like an old telephone. Built quality is great. Leather is genuine and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but didn't deliver the sound i was expecting from B&W
customer_reviews.text: While these are probably very nice headphones for the price, I was looking for a slightly more portable set of headphones than my Grado PS500's. Unfortunately, there was no comparison between the 2 as the Grados completely blew these away! Granted, the Grados are twice the price and less portable, but ohhh...those Grados are so sublime... I really was expecting more from B&W, as I have some of their other products and their performance is far better. Regardless, since they didn't meet my sound performance requirements, they were sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith M Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: best headphones I ever own great quality and sound. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am a software developer who needs to have his headphones on his ears all the time to be able to work without any distraction. I usually change one set of headphones per year and have had at least 4 or 5 top of the line noise canceling headphone for the last 4 years. I bought this set 2 months ago and should say that I have never had any headphones better than these. It cancel noise very well (good enough for me) and I just enjoy listening to my music library with these headphones. It is comfortable (I should say that I have my glasses on all the time) and it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Parsa

customer_reviews.title: poor quality wires (had to replace one after less than ...
customer_reviews.text: decent sound quality, have been using it for a while to be improved: poor quality wires (had to replace one after less than a year of use. ), the ear pads may cause discomfort if you wear for too long, like >2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: A really "impressing" product, i mean it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: A really "impressing" product,i mean it is very surprising to see that the headset of this headphone is divided when you open the box. Although it is a recertified headphone, but it is way too far for a brand such as Bowers & Wilkins。 As for the sound, i'm not an audiophile and it is also a very subjective thing,all i can say about it is that sound is very enthusiastic.fit for pop&folk songs. Besides,it is a bit narrow for me to wear
customer_reviews.author: johnsongong

customer_reviews.title: headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST ever as well as being very comfortable. Love using them. The sound is incredible. Plus, I bought them used and they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Watt

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe B&W made this product.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality build and design. Flat sounding. Uncomfortable. I can't believe B&W made this product. There loudspeakers are excellent. I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Gill

customer_reviews.title: best money i ever spent
customer_reviews.text: excellent craftsmanship, extraordinary noise isolation for this type of device, much better than $150 earbuds! awesome, tight fit to the head that can kinda pinch your ears if worn for longer than 5 hours like me! The best cans I have tried to this date.
customer_reviews.author: RYON HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Not good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The headphone's fit is a lil' tight. So my ears tend to sweat after long listening hours. I have to crank the volume all the way up id I'm listening in a public place. Very uncomfortable to hang it around my neck coz it restricts my head movement.
customer_reviews.author: karmapilots

customer_reviews.title: OH. MAH. GAWD.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Amazing. Comfortable. Gorgeous sound. Is it worth the steep price? Well, the money would be wasted on doe-eyed soft-haired teen idols but definitely well spent Pink Floyd! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Amazon should ban seller!
customer_reviews.text: I'm beyond disgusted. This is like a used set of phones, with dirt/dents to prove it. Just phones, a janky short double male cord, a computer printout of how to connect cord. No padded case, no warranty information. No iPhone cord. I'm sick to my stomach to have spent this much on a product that b&w won't even honor warranty for. Total scam. They sound better than decent, no telling how long they'll last. Save your money/time/sanity. Buy new. I'm sick to my stomach over this purchase. I'm going to go vomit now.
customer_reviews.author: John Rheinheimer

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best you can possibly buy, sound 10/10, noise isolation 9/10, commodity 10/10, better than beats: definitely. If you want awesone headphones, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: albertoeda

customer_reviews.title: like pillows on my ears.. all day comfort for sure!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I ever bought!! so comfortable, like pillows on my ears..
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This are the best headphones I have ever used. The quality and style are top notch. The comfort and fit are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Okay Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Sound is clear and crisp. Unit is light and it fits well, Sound is not to my liking or preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Vithal Godha

customer_reviews.title: Nice but for the little rip/tear on left headphone
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Did have a small leather cut on the left of the earphone, but otherwise it's good as a used product. I guess it should not have shown as like new
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin

customer_reviews.title: accurate detailed sound
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best headphones I have ever heard. They are addicting, once I start listening to them, I stay up all night. The soundstage is huge, airy and open. They are accurate and very easy to listen to. definitely no ear fatigue like u get with inaccurate headphones like Bose.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lippold

customer_reviews.title: Should be better for Price
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are decent quality and sound good. However the on-cord volume adjustment doesn't work well and breaks easily. For the price they charge ($260), should be WAY better.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stempel

customer_reviews.title: great sound but poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but poor durability. Mine only lasted six months. I ended up going with audio-technica for my replacement.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: good expirence
customer_reviews.text: I have some hifi headphones, This one always have good expirence! Deal price of amazon is 189, very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Harebell flower

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Comfy, great sound, and good for long listening.
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go. Way better sound and much less pretentious than everyone with the beats at the same price range. Lightweight and able to wear for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins P5 Headphones - Black (Wired)
product_meta.description:
Style:Headphones| Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

Bowers & Wilkins P5 mobile hi-fi headphones deliver natural, highly-detailed audio on the move. 
view larger The P5 headphones are the perfect partners for your iPhone, but the interchangeable cable means you can use them with any device. 
view larger P5 HEADPHONES
With P5 mobile hi-fi headphones, the sound you hear is completely natural – as close to the sound of the original recording as we can possibly take you. Bowers & Wilkins call it true sound, and believe that you will know it as soon as you hear it.

NOISE ISOLATION
A closed-back design with rigid metal faceplates and sealed earpads ensures that all the detail and dynamic range of your music is kept intact, while preserving just enough ambient sound to give you a sense of place. Perfect for listening to music on the go.

LUXURY MATERIALS
P5's high-quality sound and luxury materials are supported by smart design and user-friendly features. The Made for iPod cable allows easy control of an iPod, and the microphone facilitates calls on an iPhone. The leather earpads are magnetically attached, and can be quickly removed to swap the supplied cables.


The specially designed drive units inside P5 are created to produce as natural, true-to-life sound as possible. 
view larger P5's earpads are crafted from high-quality leather for a gloriously luxurious fit that aids noise-isolation and audio performance. 
view larger LISTEN FOR LONGER
Gimmicky effects like exaggerated bass or artificially enhanced treble quickly become tiring with extended listening. The P5's natural audio performance brings you close to the sound of the original recording, as you were meant to hear it. Which means you can enjoy your favorite music for longer.


WHICH HEADPHONE IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

Bowers & Wilkins P7 Headphones Bowers & Wilkins P5 Headphones Bowers & Wilkins P3 Headphones Bowers & Wilkins C5 Headphones Design Over-Ear On-Ear On-Ear In-Ear Changeable Ear Cushions Yes Yes Yes Yes Foldable Yes Folds flat Yes Carry Case/Pouch Yes Yes Yes Yes iPhone Compatible Yes Yes Yes Yes Weight 290g 195g 130g 20g 


The control room of Studio 1 at London's Abbey Road Studios, which uses Bowers & Wilkins 800 Series loudspeakers.
view larger Nautilus was the result of a five-year research program to create the perfect loudspeaker. Many technologies developed in this project are now found in all Bowers & Wilkins products.
view larger BOWERS & WILKINS HISTORY
In leading recording studios around the world, music that will soon be heard everywhere is first heard through Bowers & Wilkins loudspeakers. In London's world-famous Abbey Road Studios, all three main studios use Bowers & Wilkins 800 Series speakers to capture the output of the world's biggest-selling artists.

ENGINEERING INNOVATION
Every discovery Bowers & Wilkins' scientists make in their dedicated Research and Development facility influences how speakers all over the world are designed and built. Technologies such as Nautilus Tapering Tubes and Flowport start life in their high-end loudspeakers, but are also important factors in the likes of Zeppelin Air and their headphone range.

DOING IT FROM DAY ONE
When John Bowers set up Bowers & Wilkins in 1966, experimentation in sound and recording was escalating rapidly. It was the time of Sergeant Pepper and Pet Sounds, and Bowers had a pioneering spirit to match. His ambition was revolutionary for the day, and remains so: to create a loudspeaker that neither adds nor takes away from the music. Bowers & Wilkins has been exploring the world of sound ever since. And they'll never settle for less than perfection.

RELATED PRODUCTS FROM BOWERS & WILKINS

Bowers & Wilkins Headphones Bowers & Wilkins Wireless Music Systems Bowers & Wilkins Computer Speakers
feature_bullets: Behind P5's natural sound is some of the most advanced technology ever to be put into a set of headphones.. Connectivity Technology: Wired
Specially developed ultra-linear neodymium magnets and highly optimized Mylar diaphragms keep music sounding rich, pure and incredibly detailed, with no need for artificial adjustments.
